title: Nicola Sturgeon signs letter to resign as FM
content: This video can not be playedNicola Sturgeon has signed a letter officially tendering her resignation as Scotland's first minister <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-scotland-politics-65093281>.Ms Sturgeon announced last month that she would stand down once a successor was appointed.Humza Yousaf was elected to replace her as SNP leader and will be confirmed as the new first minister in a Holyrood vote on Tuesday afternoon.After writing her resignation letter to the King, Ms Sturgeon left her Bute House residence for the final time.She was Scotland's longest-serving first minister, having spent 3,051 days - more than eight years - in the role.
